title: Mouthwatering Breakfast Recipes For Dinner
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Sometimes that breakfast craving hits you right around . . . 6 pm. Omelets, poached eggs, and grits could be just what you need. And so here are a few recipes to satisfy your breakfast cravings — at dinner time.

  1. Mexican Rice with Poached Eggs

Savory and deeply satisfying, this recipe calls for spicy pork sausage, onion, sweet red pepper, jalapeno peppers, garlic, beef base, cumin, pepper, rice, water, Chino Valley Ranchers pasture raised eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, and tortillas.

View the recipe here.

  1. Gruyere and Egg Burgers

These mouthwatering burgers are sure to be a hit — whether you’re treating yourself or sharing with a few friends. Follow the steps to make your own cheeseburger and top with fried eggs, arugula, tomatoes, and mustard.

View the recipe here.

  1. Denver Omelet Salad

Craving something light and refreshing? This omelet salad has just the right balance of fresh veggies, protein, and healthy fats.

View the recipe here.

  1. Stir-Fry Rice Bowl

Create your own stir-fry rice bowl with carrots, zucchini, baby portobello mushrooms, bean sprouts, baby spinach, water, soy sauce, chili garlic sauce, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, brown rice, and sesame oil.

View the recipe here.

  1. Sausage and Egg Pizza

Breakfast pizza is always an excellent choice — for dinner! For this recipe, you’ll need crescent rolls, Italian turkey sausage links, mushrooms, hash brown potatoes, garlic salt, pepper, green onions, sweet red pepper, fat-free cheddar cheese, and one Chino Valley Ranchers egg.

View the recipe here.

  1. Chorizo and Grits Breakfast Bowl

Easy to make and filling, this breakfast bowl is made with chorizo chicken sausages, zucchini, quick-cooking grits, black beans, cheddar cheese, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, pico de gallo, and fresh cilantro.

View the recipe here.

  1. Veggie Nicoise Salad

Load up on veggies, fresh herbs, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, beans, olives and potatoes to make this salad. Healthy and delicious any time of day!

View the recipe here.
excerpt: Here are a few recipes to satisfy your breakfast cravings — at dinner time.
